document.full_text: unknown people attacked a convoy of northern sudanese soldiers and u.n. peacekeepers in sudan's abyei flashpoint region, wounding two, the united nations said friday.
document.title: peacekeepers, sudan soldiers attacked in abyei: u.n.
lines_and_colors: unknown people attacked a convoy of northern sudanese soldiers and u.n. peacekeepers in sudan's abyei flashpoint region, wounding two, the united nations said friday.
